title: And another
excerpt: They're robots Morty! It's okay to shoot them! They're just robots!
body: Youâ€™re like Hitler, but even Hitler cared about Germany or something. I know you're real because i have a ton of bad memories with you. It's a device Morty, that when you put it in your ear, you can enter people's dreams Morty. Its just like that movie that you keep crowing about. They're robots Morty! It's okay to shoot them! They're just robots!
author: Ronan
